title: Strictly Claudia Winkleman proud of her 'wonky' make-up look and admits she's jealous of Tess Daly
text:
She's well known for her signature beauty look and heavy use of kohl.

And Claudia Winkleman has revealed she is proud of her 'wonky' make-up look.

But that has not stopped the presenter, 47, from being jealous of her Strictly Come Dancing co-host Tess Daly, 50, who she called an 'actual goddess'.

Be yourself: Claudia Winkleman has revealed she is proud of her 'wonky' make-up look

Claudia, who was speaking in an interview with the Sunday Mirror, said her overuse of eyeliner (which she described as 'full panda') was 'better' when it 'goes wrong'.

She said: 'I AM wonky! Here’s the beauty of it – it’s only good news when "full panda" goes wrong. It looks better.

'If you’re applying eyeliner on the bus and it jerks, then good. But my daughter is brilliant at make-up and she’s appalled by how I do mine.'

And Claudia went on to heap praise on her older presenting partner.

Stunning: But that has not stopped the presenter, 47, from being jealous of her Strictly Come Dancing co-host Tess Daly, 50, who she called an 'actual goddess'

Messy is good: Claudia said her overuse of eyeliner, which she described as 'full panda' was 'better' when it 'goes wrong'

'She is so beautiful, I love her hair, I love her face, she has the most extraordinary body, but if I could steal anything it would be her metabolism,' she said.

Sticking with the messy fashion trend, Claudia is launching her own make-up line at Boots called Full Panda.

It includes mascara, double ended lipstick and make-up remover.

It comes following Claudia's latest outing on Strictly, in which she hosted the Halloween special with Tess.

After the latest round footballer Alex Scott, 35 and her dance partner Kevin Clifton after at the top of the leaderboard.

Owning up: Claudia went on to heap praise on her older presenting partner and said, 'She is so beautiful, I love her hair, I love her face'

Claudia admitted earlier this month that she is 'surprised' by being the best paid woman on TV.

The star commands a salary of between £370,000 and £374,999 a year according to the BBC's annual report.

She told The Daily Mail's Jane Fryer: 'Nobody’s more surprised than me. I don’t know how to explain it.

'I feel incredibly bonkers lucky, I assume it will end any minute now.

'And that’s also fine. It can end, and I am incredibly grateful for what I’ve had,' she added.
description: Claudia Winkleman has revealed she is 'proud' of her 'wonky' make-up look but is jealous of her Strictly Come Dancing co-host Tess Daly, 50, who she called an 'actual goddess'.
